overview: Steve Drexel voluntarily strands himself on a deserted island on a bet. He intends to re-create civilization and carves a miniature city of 52nd Street and Park Avenue out of the jungle. Drexel is befriended by his dog, a native monkey, and a wild goat that is captured in one of his traps. He attempts to cultivate a native as his Man Friday from Robinson Crusoe, but fails as the native escape.
tagline: DOUG. FAIRBANKS in a Modern Comedy-Romance That Seethes With Laughs and Action!
title: Mr. Robinson Crusoe
